tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlantGeneticData (
    species_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name STRING,
    genetic_sequence STRING,
    chromosome_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE PlantSpecies (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(50),
    common_name VARCHAR(50),
    scientific_name VARCHAR(100),
    plant_family VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT REFERENCES PlantSpecies(species_id),
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    gene_sequence TEXT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(20)
);
CREATE TABLE plant_species ( species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, genus_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, family_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE gene_sequences ( gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, species_id INT NOT NULL, sequence TEXT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE researchers ( researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE experiments ( experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT NOT NULL, gene_id INT NOT NULL, result TEXT NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE StudyResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    result_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES ResearchStudies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);
